text: The International Athletic Meeting in Honor of Miner's Day is an annual track and field meet that takes place at Ob Jezeru City Stadium in Velenje, Slovenia. It was first held in 1995. The most recent edition took place in 2017. ==Meeting records== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Athlete !Nationality !Date !Ref |- |100 m |9.94 (+0.9 m/s) |Wayde van Niekerk | |20 June 2017 | |- |200 m |20.32 |Isaac Makwala | | | |- |400 m |45.09 |Pavel Maslák | |1 July 2015 | |- |800 m |1:44.19 |Amel Tuka | |1 July 2015 | |- |3000 m |8:27.54 |Vid Tršan | |1 July 2015 | |- |5000 m |13:22.75 |David Bett | | | |- |rowspan=2|Long jump |rowspan=2|8.13 m |Gregor Cankar | | | |- |Rogerio Bispo | | | |- |Shot put |20.26 m |Tomasz Majewski | |1 July 2015 | |- |Discus throw |65.63 m |Michael Möllenbeck | | | |- |Hammer throw |82.37 m |Paweł Fajdek | | | |- |Javelin throw |81.82 m |Hamish Peacock | |20 June 2017 | |- |} ===Women=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Athlete !Nationality !Date !Ref |- |100 m |12.13 (+0.2 m/s) |Tina Jureš | |1 July 2015 | |- |200 m |23.22 (-0.3 m/s) |Maja Mihalinec | |1 July 2015 | |- |400 m |51.03 |Ana Gabriela Guevara | | | |- |1500 m |4:07.34 |Amela Terzić | | | |- |100 m hurdles |12.96 |Marina Tomić | | | |- |3000 m steeplechase |9:50.19 |Mohamed Bezuayehu | |1 July 2015 | |- |Pole vault |4.70 |Svetlana Feofanova | | | |- |Long jump |6.90 |Olga Kucherenko | | | |- |Discus throw |69.58 m |Sandra Perković | |20 June 2017 | |- |Hammer throw |71.75 m |Yipsi Moreno | | | |- |Javelin throw |67.98 m |Mariya Abakumova | | | |} ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Meeting records Category:European Athletic Association meetings Category:Athletics competitions in Slovenia Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in Slovenia
title: International Athletic Meeting in Honor of Miner's Day
